title: The Runaways and the Everlasting
description: When Mariah leaves home to join the Runaways, she expects to solve all of her problems and finally meet Kitch, the boy she's been talking to online for the past six months. She doesn't expect to be forced into an elaborate, lethal game run by the Everlasting, a race of demented ex-humans.A gang including, two metal heads, a fifties movie star reincarnation, and a cryptic chain smoker, the Runaways find themselves chasing jewels all over London in a race to the finish line against a sociopathic socialite - and as if that wasn't enough, Mariah and the others have their own demons to face along the way.
author: Monifa Anderson
